DIA_Homeless_EXIT_03_02: You didn't particularly surprise me with that.
DIA_Homeless_WhatUp_03_02: It is a very minor issue.
DIA_Homeless_WhatUp_03_03: It won't cost you much and it will help me a lot.
DIA_Homeless_WhatUp_03_04: I only need one gold piece from you! I'm not asking for anything else.
DIA_Homeless_HomelessGold_03_02: Thank you, sir! May Innos keep you safe!
DIA_Homeless_INeedGold_03_01: Would you be willing to help me?
DIA_Homeless_INeedGold_03_02: I only need one gold piece.
DIA_Homeless_IHelped_03_02: And I was very grateful for that!
DIA_Homeless_SCARED_03_02: I don't want anything from you anymore!
